org.gstreamer.lowlevel

Interface GstURIAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sun.jna.Library

    public interface GstURIAPI
extends com.sun.jna.Library
    The URIHandler is an interface that is implemented by Source and Sink GstElement to simplify then handling of URI. An application can use the following functions to quickly get an element that handles the given URI for reading or writing (gst_element_make_from_uri()). Source and Sink plugins should implement this interface when possible.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.sun.jna.Library
